/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/no-redundant-roles */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React from 'react' import { StarIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' import QuantityInput from './from' const product = { name: 'Green Flower', price: '193.00 ر.س', href: '', breadcrumbs: [ { id: 1, name: ' الرئيسية ', href: '/' }, { id: 2, name: ' Shuja Collection ', href: '' }, ], images: [ { src: 'https://media.zid.store/bda63855-f7ff-4be7-bd9f-1d497a22336c/edf0a930-e5d6-46b7-b6c2-4facff4fbb7f.jpg', alt: 'Two each of gray, white, and black shirts laying flat.', }, { src: 'https://media.zid.store/bda63855-f7ff-4be7-bd9f-1d497a22336c/281608d4-2d5a-44bb-9973-5f437a8f6c77.jpg', alt: 'Model wearing plain black basic tee.', }, { src: 'https://media.zid.store/bda63855-f7ff-4be7-bd9f-1d497a22336c/7eef0b11-2eaf-4495-990c-d35de12580ee.png', alt: 'Model wearing plain gray basic tee.', }, { src: 'https://media.zid.store/bda63855-f7ff-4be7-bd9f-1d497a22336c/f781efce-7be4-4894-8b34-0b29ff7e297b.png?_ga=2.227989659.707408916.1694256975-812482167.1694256975', alt: 'Model wearing plain white basic tee.', }, ], description: '', highlights: [ ], details: '', } const reviews = { href: '#', average: 4, totalCount: 117 } function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } const CardDetails = ({product}) => { const [productsToShow, setProductsToShow] = useState([]); const onItemClick = (product) => { setProductsToShow(products.filter((p) => p.id === product.id)); }; return (
    {product.breadcrumbs.map((breadcrumb) => (
  1. {breadcrumb.name}
    2. ))}
  2. {product.name}
{/* Image gallery */}
{/* Product info */}

{product.name}

{/* Options */}

Product information

{product.price}

{/* Reviews */}

آراء المتسوقين

{[0, 1, 2, 3, 4].map((rating) => ( rating ? 'text-yellow-400' : 'text-gray-200', 'h-5 w-5 flex-shrink-0' )} aria-hidden="true" /> ))}

{reviews.average} out of 5 stars

{reviews.totalCount} آراء المتسوقين
وسائل دفع أمنة 100%
{/* Description and details */}
) } export default CardDetails
